some evidence that Kalevan is okay...<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72321.<pc>は マレイカに\n銀のカメオを 渡して\nカレヴァンからの メッセージを:
<pc> gave Maleika the Silver Cameo and the
message from Kalevan!

72322.<voice 00995_00072322><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00995_00072322><start_lip_sync n02243 _normal m00001>This is... I gave him this cameo as a good luck charm
before the war, there's no mistaking it!<stop_lip_animation n02243 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72323.<voice 01140_00072323><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01140_00072323><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Hmm... Kalevan said that he can't come home yet, but
he definitely will soon, and that we shouldn't worry...<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72324.<voice 01250_00072324><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01250_00072324><start_lip_sync n02243 _normal m00001>He can't return home yet and won't say exactly why
means there's a reason he doesn't want us to worry,
doesn't it...<stop_lip_animation n02243 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72325.<voice 01290_00072325><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01290_00072325><start_lip_sync n02243 _normal m00001>I'll believe my husband's words and keep waiting. I'll try
telling our son that too.<stop_lip_animation n02243 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72326.<voice 01385_00072326><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01385_00072326><start_lip_sync n02243 _normal m00001>King Moonis, <pc>. For everything, thank you
very much. This will give me hope...<stop_lip_animation n02243 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72327.<voice 01475_00072327><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01475_00072327><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Mm-hmm! Again, if there's anything else you need, you
can always come to me.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72328.<voice 01705_00072328><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01705_00072328><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Now then, <pc>. Please tell me the details of what
you saw.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72329.<voice 01765_00072329><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01765_00072329><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>You found Kalevan as a monster, didn't you? Why did
you not bring him here?<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72330.<pc>は 偽りのレンダーシアの存在と\nそこで カレヴァンと再会してからのでき:
<pc> told King Moonis about the existence of
False Lendersia and the events that occurred since they
last reunited with Kalevan.

72331.<voice 01925_00072331><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01925_00072331><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>My goodness. Kalevan and the soldiers were taken to
this "False Lendersia", you say...<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72332.<voice 01955_00072332><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 01955_00072332><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>I cannot possibly believe it, and yet... So long as you say
it is so, I can only place my trust in you.<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72333.<voice 02005_00072333><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02005_00072333><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>That's right! I haven't thanked you yet, have I.
I appreciate you taking on such a meddlesome request.
Please accept this!<stop_lip_animation n02239 CLOSE_MOUTH>

72334.<voice 02135_00072334><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 02135_00072334><start_lip_sync n02239 _normal m00001>Speaking of which, you... You said that you found

72335.<voice 02225_00072335><start_lip_sync n0:
